description: Types or pastes a given string on the specified device, simulating keyboard input.

device.description: The device on which the string should be typed. Can be PC, laptop, phone, or tab.

typingContent.description: The text to type on the device. For example: 'Hello world', 'My name is Om', etc.

examples: type hello world on my pc
write my name is om on laptop
type meeting at 5 pm on phone
type this is a test message on tab
